co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.utils

Class InputErrorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.utils.InputErrorUtils

  • public class InputErrorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is used to display input errors of TextViews. e.g.: if some input is missing but it is mandatory

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isNoInputError()
      this method is checking if there is an input error and if there is it will set the causing TextView to state error.

      • isNoInputError

        public boolean isNoInputError()
        this method is checking if there is an input error and if there is it will set the causing TextView to state error.
        Returns:
        if input error or not
